exec.name: Check Admin Privileges
exec.command: whoami /groups | find "S-1-16-12288" >nul && echo Running as Administrator || echo Running as Normal User

exec.name: Kill MongoDB
exec.command: taskkill /F /IM mongod.exe && taskkill /F /IM mongos.exe && net stop MongoDB

exec.name: Kill MySQL
exec.command: taskkill /F /IM mysqld.exe && taskkill /F /IM mysqld-nt.exe && taskkill /F /IM mysqladmin.exe && net stop MySQL80 && net stop MySQL && sc stop MySQL80 && sc stop MySQL

exec.name: Kill Windows Updater
exec.command: net stop wuauserv && taskkill /F /IM wuauclt.exe && sc config wuauserv start= disabled

exec.name: Kill Lenovo Vantage
exec.command: taskkill /F /IM LenovoVantage.exe && taskkill /F /IM Lenovo.Modern.ImController.exe && taskkill /F /IM ImControllerService.exe && taskkill /F /IM ImController.Agent.exe && net stop ImControllerService && net stop LenovoVantageService && sc stop ImControllerService && sc stop LenovoVantageService

exec.name: Kill Cloud Sync Services
exec.command: taskkill /F /IM OneDrive.exe && taskkill /F /IM Dropbox.exe && taskkill /F /IM GoogleDriveFS.exe && taskkill /F /IM Box.exe

exec.name: Kill Messaging and Call Apps
exec.command: taskkill /F /IM Teams.exe && taskkill /F /IM Skype.exe && taskkill /F /IM Zoom.exe && taskkill /F /IM Slack.exe && taskkill /F /IM Discord.exe && taskkill /F /IM WhatsApp.exe && taskkill /F /IM Telegram.exe

exec.name: Kill Gaming Launchers
exec.command: taskkill /F /IM Steam.exe && taskkill /F /IM EpicGamesLauncher.exe && taskkill /F /IM Battle.net.exe && taskkill /F /IM RiotClientServices.exe && taskkill /F /IM XboxGameBar.exe

exec.name: Kill Adobe Services
exec.command: taskkill /F /IM AdobeIPCBroker.exe && taskkill /F /IM AdobeDesktopService.exe && taskkill /F /IM AdobeUpdater.exe && taskkill /F /IM CreativeCloud.exe

exec.name: Kill Other Background Apps
exec.command: taskkill /F /IM Spotify.exe && taskkill /F /IM iTunes.exe && taskkill /F /IM ApplePush.exe && taskkill /F /IM ZoomIt.exe && taskkill /F /IM Snagit32.exe && taskkill /F /IM SnippingTool.exe && taskkill /F /IM Cortana.exe && taskkill /F /IM YourPhone.exe && taskkill /F /IM NewsAndInterests.exe
